abacamanza:18:16: 16.Kandi abo bagabo magana atandatu bo muri bene Dani bari bahagaze ku irembo mu muharuro, bitwaje intwaro zo kurwanisha.
abacamanza:18:17: 17.Nuko ba bagabo batanu bari bagiye gutata igihugu baraza binjira mu rugo, basahura igishushanyo kibajwe na efodi na terafimu n’igishushanyo kiyagijwe, kandi umutambyi yari ahagaze ku irembo mu muharuro, hamwe n’abo bagabo magana atandatu bitwaje intwaro zo kurwanisha.
abacamanza:18:18: 18.Binjira mu rugo rwa Mika. Bagisahura igishushanyo kibajwe na efodi na terafimu n’igishushanyo kiyagijwe, umutambyi arababaza ati “Muragira ibiki?”
abacamanza:18:19: 19.Baramusubiza bati “Ceceka upfuke umunwa tujyane, utubere umubyeyi n’umutambyi. Mbese ikikubereye icyiza ni ikihe? Ni ukuba umutambyi w’urugo rw’umuntu umwe, cyangwa kuba umutambyi w’umuryango n’ubwoko bwa Isirayeli?”
abacamanza:18:20: 20.Nuko umutambyi yishima mu mutima we, ajyana efodi na terafimu n’igishushanyo kibajwe, agenda hagati y’abo bantu bamushagaye.
abacamanza:18:21: 21.Nuko barahindukira baragenda, bīmiriza abana bato imbere, n’amatungo n’ibintu.
abacamanza:18:22: 22.Bicumyeho akarere bavuye kwa Mika, abantu bo mu ngo zegeranye n’urwa Mika baraterana, baraza basesekara kuri bene Dani
abacamanza:18:23: 23.barabakabukana. Abadani barakebuka babaza Mika bati “Ubaye iki gitumye uzana igitero kingana gityo?”
abacamanza:18:24: 24.Arabasubiza ati “Ni uko mwanyaze imana zanjye niremeye n’umutambyi wanjye, mukabijyana. Hari icyo nsigaranye? None murambaza ngo ‘Mbaye iki?’ ”
abacamanza:18:25: 25.Abadani baramusubiza bati “Ntiwongere kuvuga muri twe, hatagira abanyaburakari babasumira, bakakwicana n’abo mu rugo rwawe.”
abacamanza:18:26: 26.Nuko Abadani barigendera. Mika abonye ko bamurushije amaboko arahindukira asubira iwe.
abacamanza:18:27: Abadani batera Abasidoni27.Nuko Abadani bajyana ibyo Mika yaremye n’umutambyi yari afite, bagera i Layishi mu bantu b’abanyetuza bari amahoro, babīcisha inkota, batwika n’umudugudu wabo.
abacamanza:18:28: 28.Kandi nta murengezi wabonetse ngo awutabare, kuko wari kure y’i Sidoni kandi nta muntu n’umwe bari bafatanije, hari mu kibaya gihereranye n’i Betirehobu. Nuko Abadani bubakayo umudugudu bawuturamo.
abacamanza:18:29: 29.Bawuhimba i Dani bawitiriye sekuruza Dani wabyawe na Isirayeli, ariko ubwa mbere uwo mudugudu witwaga Layishi.
abacamanza:18:30: 30.Nuko Abadani bishingira icyo gishushanyo kibajwe, kandi Yonatani mwene Gerushomu umuhungu wa Mose we n’abahungu be, bari abatambyi b’umuryango wa Dani kugeza igihe igihugu cyanyagiwe.
abacamanza:18:31: 31.Nuko bashinga icyo gishushanyo kibajwe Mika yaremye, gihamaho kumara igihe cyose inzu y’Imana yabereye i Shilo.
abacamanza:19:1: Ibyabaye ku Mulewi n’umugore we1.Muri iyo minsi nta mwami Abisirayeli bari bafite. Nuko hariho Umulewi wasuhukiye mu gihugu cyo hirya y’imisozi miremire ya Efurayimu, ashaka umugore i Betelehemu y’i Buyuda.
abacamanza:19:2: 2.Bukeye umugore we aramuhararuka akajya asambana, arahukana ajya kwa se i Betelehemu y’i Buyuda, amarayo amezi ane.
abacamanza:19:3: 3.Bukeye umugabo we arahaguruka, aramukurikira ari kumwe n’umugaragu we n’indogobe ebyiri, amubwira ineza kugira ngo amucyure. Nuko umugore amujyana mu nzu ya se. Sebukwe amubonye amusanganira yishima.
abacamanza:19:4: 4.Nuko sebukwe, se w’uwo mukobwa aramusibya, amarana na we iminsi itatu, bararya baranywa bararayo.
abacamanza:19:5: 5.Ariko ku munsi wa kane bazinduka mu gitondo kare, nuko uwo mugabo arahaguruka ngo agende. Se w’umukobwa abwira umukwe we ati “Enda agatsima usegure umutima, mubone kugenda.”
abacamanza:19:6: 6.Nuko baricara baranywa barasangira, se w’umukobwa abwira umukwe we ati “Ndakwinginze rara hano iri joro, unezerwe.”
abacamanza:19:7: 7.Uwo mugabo arahaguruka ngo agende, ariko sebukwe aramwinginga ngo yongere kurara.
abacamanza:19:8: 8.Ku munsi wa gatatu azinduka mu gitondo kare ngo agende. Se w’umukobwa aravuga ati “Ndakwinginze tuza, twiriranwe tugeze ko bwira.” Nuko barasangira.
abacamanza:19:9: 9.Umunsi ukuze, uwo mugabo ahagurukana n’umugore we n’umugaragu we ngo bagende. Sebukwe, se w’umukobwa aramubwira ati “Dore burije, ndabinginze murare hano ijoro riraguye. Rara hano unezerwe, maze mu gitondo cya kare uzatahe.”
abacamanza:19:10: 10.Ariko uwo mugabo ntiyemera kurara, arahaguruka arigaba agera ahateganye n’i Yebusi (ari yo Yerusalemu). Yari afite indogobe ebyiri ziriho amatandiko, umugore we na we bari kumwe.
abacamanza:19:11: 11.Bagera i Yebusi umunsi ukuze, nuko umugaragu abwira shebuja ati “Ndakwinginze ngwino dukebereze aha, tujye gucumbika muri uyu mudugudu w’Abayebusi.”
abacamanza:19:12: 12.Ariko shebuja aramubwira ati “Ntituri bukebereze mu mudugudu w’abanyamahanga utari uw’Abisirayeli, ahubwo twambuke dufate i Gibeya.”
abacamanza:19:13: 13.Maze abwira umugaragu we ati “Ngwino twegere umudugudu umwe muri iyo, turare i Gibeya cyangwa i Rama.”
abacamanza:19:14: 14.Nuko barakomeza baragenda, izuba ribarengeraho bageze bugufi bw’i Gibeya y’Ababenyamini.
abacamanza:19:15: 15.Bakebereza aho, bajya gucumbika i Gibeya. Agezeyo yicara mu nzira y’igihogere cy’umudugudu, kuko ari nta wemeye kubacumbikira.
abacamanza:19:16: 16.Nuko muri uwo mugoroba haza umusaza uvuye mu murima aho yakoraga, yari umunyagihugu cy’imisozi miremire ya Efurayimu wasuhukiye i Gibeya, ariko bene uwo mudugudu bari Ababenyamini.
abacamanza:19:17: 17.Yubura amaso ye abona umugenzi mu nzira y’igihogere cy’umudugudu, uwo musaza aramubaza ati “Urava he ukajya he?”
abacamanza:19:18: 18.Aramusubiza ati “Turava i Betelehemu y’i Buyuda, tukajya mu gihugu cyo hirya y’imisozi miremire ya Efurayimu. Ni yo naturutse njya i Betelehemu y’i Buyuda, none ndajya mu nzu y’Uwiteka kandi nta muntu wanyakiriye ngo anjyane iwe.
abacamanza:19:19: 19.Ariko dufite inganagano n’ibyokurya by’indogobe zacu, kandi hariho umutsima na vino byo kumpazanya n’umuja wawe n’umuhungu uri hamwe n’abagaragu bawe, nta cyo dukennye.”
abacamanza:19:20: 20.Uwo musaza aravuga ati “Shyitsa umutima mu nda, kandi ibyo ukennye byose abe ari jye bibazwa, ariko mwe kurara mu nzira.”
abacamanza:19:21: 21.Nuko abashyira mu rugo rwe, agaburira indogobe z’uwo mugabo, boga ibirenge maze bararya baranywa.
abacamanza:19:22: 22.Nuko bakinezerewe haza abanyamudugudu b’ibigoryi bagota inzu impande zose, bakomanga ku rugi bavugana n’uwo musaza nyir’urugo bati “Sohora uwo mugabo winjiye mu wawe, kugira ngo tumumenye.”
abacamanza:19:23: 23.Uwo mugabo nyir’urugo arasohoka arababwira ati “Reka bene data ndabinginze, mwe gukora icyaha gisa gityo! Ubwo uyu mugabo yinjiye mu nzu yanjye, mwe kugira ubupfu bungana butyo.
abacamanza:19:24: 24.Dore nguyu umukobwa wanjye w’inkumi n’umugore w’uyu mugabo, abo ni bo nsohora namwe mubonone, mubagire uko mushaka, ariko uyu mugabo mwe kumugirira iby’isoni nke bene ibyo.”
abacamanza:19:25: 25.Ariko abo bagabo banga kumwumvira. Nuko uwo mushyitsi afata umugore we aramubazanira, baramumenya, baramwonona bakesha ijoro, umuseke utambitse baramurekura.
abacamanza:19:26: 26.Nuko mu museke, uwo mugore aragaruka agwa ku muryango w’inzu y’uwo musaza, aho shebuja yari acumbitse, burinda bucya.
abacamanza:19:27: 27.Nuko shebuja abyuka mu gitondo akingura urugi rw’inzu, arasohoka ngo agende. Nuko asanga uwo mugore acuze umurambo ku muryango, intoki ze ziri mu irebe ry’umuryango.
abacamanza:19:28: 28.Aramubwira ati “Haguruka tugende”, ariko ntiyakoma. Aherako aramuterura amushyira ku ndogobe ye. Nuko uwo mugabo aherako arataha.
abacamanza:19:29: 29.Ageze iwe ashyira intumbi y’umugore we mu nzu, yenda icyuma, amucagagura ingingo zose mo ibice cumi na bibiri, abyohereza mu bihugu bya Isirayeli byose.
abacamanza:19:30: 30.Nuko ababibonye bose baravuga bati “Ibintu bimeze bitya ntabwo byigeze gukorwa cyangwa kuboneka, uhereye umunsi Abisirayeli baviriye muri Egiputa kugeza ubu. Nuko nimubitekereze mubigire inama, mubivuge.”
abacamanza:20:1: Abisirayeli bitura Ababenyamini inabi bakoze1.Maze Abisirayeli bose bava mu midugudu yabo, barema iteraniro. Nuko iteraniro ryabo riteranira icyarimwe i Misipa imbere y’Uwiteka bavuye mu gihugu cyose, uhereye i Dani ukageza i Bērisheba, hamwe n’abo mu gihugu cy’i Galeyadi.
abacamanza:20:2: 2.Maze abatware b’abantu bose b’imiryango y’Abisirayeli yose biyerekanira mu iteraniro ry’ubwoko bw’Imana, abagabo uduhumbi tune bigenza bitwaje inkota.
abacamanza:20:3: 3.(Kandi Ababenyamini bari bumvise ko Abisirayeli bazamutse, bagiye i Misipa.) Nuko Abisirayeli barabaza bati “Tubwire uko icyo cyaha cyakozwe.”
abacamanza:20:4: 4.Umulewi, umugabo w’uwo mugore bishe arabasubiza ati “Nari ngeze i Gibeya y’Ababenyamini, ncumbikayo ndi kumwe n’umugore wanjye.
abacamanza:20:5: 5.Maze nijoro ab’i Gibeya barantera, bagota inzu narimo, bashakaga kunyica ubwanjye, kandi umugore wanjye baramwonona arapfa.
abacamanza:20:6: 6.Ndamuzana mucagaguramo ibice, mperako mbyohereza mu gihugu cyose cya gakondo y’Abisirayeli, kuko bakoze icyaha cy’ubusambanyi kandi kizira mu Isirayeli.
abacamanza:20:7: 7.Mwa Bisirayeli mwese mwe, nimwuzuze inama muvuge icyo muzakora.”
abacamanza:20:8: 8.Abantu bose baherako bahagurukira icyarimwe baravuga bati “Nta muntu n’umwe muri twe uzinjira mu ihema rye cyangwa uzataha mu rugo rwe,
abacamanza:20:9: 9.ahubwo tuzagirira ab’i Gibeya, tuhatere uko ubufindo butweretse.
abacamanza:20:10: 10.Kandi tuzatoranya abagabo cumi mu bantu ijana tubakuye mu miryango yose y’Abisirayeli, kandi dutore ijana mu bantu igihumbi, n’igihumbi mu bantu inzovu bo kwikorera amahamba y’ingabo, kugira ngo nibagera i Gibeya y’Ababenyamini, babīture inabi y’ubupfu bakoze mu Isirayeli bwose.”
abacamanza:20:11: 11.Nuko Abisirayeli bose bateranira kurwanya uwo mudugudu bahuje umutima, baba nk’umuntu umwe.
abacamanza:20:12: 12.Maze imiryango y’Abisirayeli ituma abantu mu muryango w’Ababenyamini hose, barabaza bati “Icyo cyaha cyabonetse muri mwe ni icy’iki?
abacamanza:20:13: 13.Noneho nimuduhe abo bagabo b’ibigoryi bari i Gibeya, tubice dukure icyaha muri Isirayeli.” Ariko Ababenyamini banga kumvira Abisirayeli bene wabo.
abacamanza:20:14: 14.Nuko Ababenyamini bavuye mu midugudu, yabo biteraniriza i Gibeya ngo bajye kurwana n’Abisirayeli.
abacamanza:20:15: 15.Maze uwo munsi babara Ababenyamini bavuye mu midugudu yabo, abagabo bitwaje inkota inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bitandatu, udashyizeho abaturage b’i Gibeya, abagabo magana arindwi batoranijwe.
abacamanza:20:16: 16.Kandi muri abo bantu bose harimo abagabo batoranijwe magana arindwi batwarira imoso, umuntu wese muri bo yashoboraga kurekura umuhumetso, ntabe yahusha n’agasatsi atagahamije.
abacamanza:20:17: 17.Abisirayeli babazwe bari abagabo bitwaje inkota inzovu enye Ababenyamini batarimo, abo bose bari ingabo.
abacamanza:20:18: 18.Nuko Abisirayeli barahaguruka bajya i Beteli, bagisha Imana inama barabaza bati “Ni nde uzatubanziriza kurwana n’Ababenyamini?” Uwiteka arabasubiza ati “Abayuda ni bo bazabanzayo.”
abacamanza:20:19: 19.Maze Abisirayeli bibatura mu gitondo, bagandika hafi y’i Gibeya.
abacamanza:20:20: 20.Nuko Abisirayeli batera Ababenyamini, birema ingamba i Gibeya ngo babarwanye.
abacamanza:20:21: 21.Maze uwo munsi Ababenyamini bava i Gibeya, batikiza Abisirayeli bahasiga imirambo inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bibiri.
abacamanza:20:22: 22.Ariko abantu ba Isirayeli bisubiramo, bongera kwirema ingamba aho bari baziremeye ubwa mbere.
abacamanza:20:23: 23.Abisirayeli barazamuka baririra imbere y’Uwiteka kugeza nimugoroba, babaza Uwiteka bati “Twongere kurwana n’Ababenyamini bene wacu?” Uwiteka arabasubiza ati “Nimwongere mubatere.”
abacamanza:20:24: 24.Maze ku munsi wa kabiri Abisirayeli bongera kwegera Ababenyamini.
abacamanza:20:25: 25.Nuko uwo munsi Ababenyamini barabatera, bongera koreza abantu bahasiga imirambo inzovu imwe n’ibihumbi munani, abo bose bari ingabo zitwaje inkota.
abacamanza:20:26: 26.Nuko ingabo z’Abisirayeli zose n’abantu bose barazamuka bajya i Beteli, bicara imbere y’Uwiteka barira, biyiriza ubusa uwo munsi bageza nimugoroba. Kandi batambira imbere y’Uwiteka ibitambo byoswa n’ibitambo by’ishimwe yuko bari amahoro.
abacamanza:20:27: 27.Maze Abisirayeli bagisha Uwiteka inama. (Kandi muri iyo minsi isanduku y’isezerano ry’Uwiteka yari ihari,
abacamanza:20:28: 28.na Finehasi mwene Eleyazari mwene Aroni ni we wahagararaga imbere yayo.) Maze Abisirayeli babaza Uwiteka baravuga bati “Twongere kujya kurwana n’Ababenyamini bene wacu kandi, cyangwa se turekere aho?” Uwiteka aravuga ati “Mubatere kuko ejo nzababagabiza mukabanesha.”
abacamanza:20:29: 29.Nuko Abisirayeli bashyira abantu mu bico impande zose z’i Gibeya.
abacamanza:20:30: 30.Nuko ku munsi wa gatatu Abisirayeli batera Ababenyamini, birema ingamba i Gibeya nk’ubwa mbere.
abacamanza:20:31: 31.Ababenyamini babonye Abisirayeli barabasanganira, barabashukashuka ngo bave ku mudugudu, batangira gutsinda abantu babīca nk’ubwa mbere, babīcira mu mirima no mu nzira y’igihogere ijya i Beteli no mu nzira y’i Gibeya, mu Bisirayeli hapfa abantu nka mirongo itatu.
abacamanza:20:32: 32.Ababenyamini baravuga bati “Turabanesheje nk’ubwa mbere!”
abacamanza:20:33: Ababenyamini bicwa cyane Ariko Abisirayeli baravuga bati “Twiruke tubashukashuke bave ku mudugudu bajye mu nzira z’ibihogere.”33.Nuko Abisirayeli bose bava aho bari bari, birema ingamba i Bālitamari, ariko Abisirayeli bari mu bico babyuka aho bari bari i Māregeba.
abacamanza:20:34: 34.Nuko haza abantu inzovu imwe batoranijwe mu Bisirayeli bose, batera i Gibeya baravungagurana cyane, ariko Ababenyamini bari batazi ko ibyago bibari bugufi.
abacamanza:20:35: 35.Uwiteka atsinda Ababenyamini imbere y’Abisirayeli, maze uwo munsi Abisirayeli boreza Ababenyamini inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bitanu n’ijana, kandi abo bose bari ingabo zitwaje inkota.
abacamanza:20:36: 36.Nuko Ababenyamini bakeka ko Abisirayeli baneshejwe, kuko Abisirayeli bashukashukaga Ababenyamini, basubira inyuma kuko bari biringiye abo bari bashyize mu bico bugufi bw’i Gibeya.
abacamanza:20:37: 37.Nuko abaciye igico bahuta gusakiza i Gibeya, bajya imbere barimbuza umudugudu wose inkota.
abacamanza:20:38: 38.Abisirayeli bose bari basezeranye ikimenyetso n’abaciye igico, yuko bazacana ikome, umwotsi ugatumbagira mu mudugudu nk’igicu.
abacamanza:20:39: 39.Nuko Abisirayeli biyegura mu ntambara, maze Ababenyamini batangira kubakubita inkota, bica mu Bisirayeli abantu nka mirongo itatu, kuko bibwiraga ko babanesheje nko muri ya ntambara ya mbere.
abacamanza:20:40: 40.Ariko umwotsi utangiye gutumbagira mu mudugudu nk’igicu, Ababenyamini barakebuka babona umudugudu wose ugurumana, umwotsi utumbagira mu kirere.
abacamanza:20:41: 41.Nuko Abisirayeli barabahindukirana Ababenyamini barumirwa, kuko babonye ibyago bibagezeho.
abacamanza:20:42: 42.Nuko baha Abisirayeli ibitugu, baromboreza inzira yose ijya mu butayu, ariko ingabo zibarya isataburenge, kandi izivuye mu mudugudu ziboreka hagati muri iyo nzira.
abacamanza:20:43: 43.Maze bagota Ababenyamini barabirukana, babaribatira aho bashakaga kuruhukira, babageza ahateganye n’i Gibeya iburasirazuba.
abacamanza:20:44: 44.Hapfa Ababenyamini inzovu imwe n’ibihumbi munani, abo bose bari abantu b’intwari.
abacamanza:20:45: 45.Muri ba bandi bahaye Abisirayeli ibitugu, bagahungira mu nzira ijya mu butayu kugira ngo bagere ku gitare cya Rimoni, babīcamo abantu ibihumbi bitanu babatsotsobera mu nzira z’ibihogere, bakomeza kubarya isataburenge babageza i Gidomu, bicirayo abandi ibihumbi bibiri.
abacamanza:20:46: 46.Nuko abapfuye uwo munsi bose bo mu Babenyamini, bari abantu bitwaje inkota inzovu ebyiri n’ibihumbi bitanu, abo bose bari intwari.
abacamanza:20:47: 47.Mu bari bahungiye mu butayu, abantu magana atandatu bagera ku gitare cya Rimoni bamarayo amezi ane.
abacamanza:20:48: 48.Abisirayeli bahindūrana mu Babenyamini, bicisha inkota abo mu mudugudu bose n’amatungo, batsemba n’ibintu byabo kandi imidugudu basangaga barayitwika yose.
abacamanza:21:1: Abisirayeli babonera Ababenyamini abagore1.Kandi Abisirayeli bari bararahiriye i Misipa bati “Nta muntu n’umwe muri twe uzashyingira Umubenyamini umukobwa we.”
abacamanza:21:2: 2.Nuko abantu bose basubira i Beteli, bicara imbere y’Imana bageza nimugoroba barira batera hejuru cyane,
abacamanza:21:3: 3.barabaza bati “Uwiteka Mana y’Abisirayeli, ni iki gituma tubura umuryango umwe mu Bisirayeli?”
abacamanza:21:4: 4.Nuko bukeye bwaho bazinduka kare, bahubaka igicaniro batamba ibitambo byoswa, n’ibitambo by’ishimwe yuko bari amahoro.
abacamanza:21:5: 5.Abisirayeli barabaza bati “Mu miryango yose y’Abisirayeli utaje mu iteraniro ry’Uwiteka ni nde?” Kuko bari barahiye indahiro ikomeye ku muntu wese utazaza gusenga Uwiteka i Misipa bati “Ni ukuri azicwa.”
abacamanza:21:6: 6.Nuko Abisirayeli baricuza ku bw’Ababenyamini bene wabo baravuga bati “Uyu munsi hariho umuryango uciwe muri Isirayeli.
abacamanza:21:7: 7.Tubigenze dute ngo dushakire abacitse ku icumu abagore, kandi ko twarahiye imbere y’Uwiteka ko tutazabashyingira abakobwa bacu?”
abacamanza:21:8: 8.Nuko barabaza bati “Mu miryango y’Abisirayeli utazamutse gusenga Uwiteka i Misipa ni uwuhe?” Babona ko nta muntu wavuye i Yabeshi y’i Galeyadi, ngo aze mu ngando aho bateraniye,
abacamanza:21:9: 9.kuko ubwo abantu bari bamaze kubarwa, nta wo mu baturage b’i Yabeshi y’i Galeyadi wari uhari.
abacamanza:21:10: 10.Nuko iteraniro ritumayo abantu inzovu imwe n’ibihumbi bibiri barusha abandi kuba intwari, barabategeka bati “Nimugende mwicishe inkota abaturage b’i Yabeshi y’i Galeyadi, mubicane n’abagore n’abana babo.
abacamanza:21:11: 11.Uko abe ari ko muzabigenza rwose, umugabo wese n’umugore wese waryamanye n’umugabo muzabarimbure.”
abacamanza:21:12: 12.Nuko muri abo baturage b’i Yabeshi y’i Galeyadi, babonayo abakobwa b’inkumi magana ane batararyamana n’abagabo, babazana mu ngando z’i Shilo mu gihugu cy’i Kanāni.
abacamanza:21:13: 13.Nuko iteraniro ryose rituma ku Babenyamini bari ku gitare cya Rimoni, babaha ihumure.
abacamanza:21:14: 14.Ubwo ngubwo Ababenyamini baragaruka, Abisirayeli babashyingira abo bakobwa bakijije mu bagore b’i Yabeshi y’i Galeyadi, ariko ntibabakwira.
abacamanza:21:15: 15.Nuko abantu baricuza ku bw’Ababenyamini, kuko Uwiteka yari yaciye icyuho mu miryango y’Abisirayeli.
abacamanza:21:16: 16.Nuko abakuru b’iteraniro barabaza bati “Tuzabigenza dute ngo dushakire abasigaye, ko abagore barimbutse mu Babenyamini?”
abacamanza:21:17: 17.Baravuga bati “Hakwiriye kubaho gakondo y’Ababenyamini bacitse ku icumu, kugira ngo hatagira umuryango uzimanganywa mu Bisirayeli.
abacamanza:21:18: 18.Ariko ntitubasha kubashyingira abakobwa bacu, kuko twarahiye tuti ‘Havumwe uzashyingira Umubenyamini.’ ”
abacamanza:21:19: 19.Maze baravuga bati “Uko umwaka utashye, hariho umunsi mukuru w’Uwiteka i Shilo iri ikasikazi y’i Beteli, mu ruhande rw’iburasirazuba rw’inzira iva i Beteli ikajya i Shekemu, ikusi y’i Lebona.”
abacamanza:21:20: 20.Nuko bategeka Ababenyamini barababwira bati “Nimugende mwubikirire mu mizabibu.
abacamanza:21:21: 21.Nuko nimubona abakobwa b’i Shilo basohotse kujya kubyina mu birori byabo, muzahereko muve mu mizabibu, umuntu wese afate umukobwa mu b’i Shilo abe umugore we, muhereko musubire muri gakondo ya Benyamini.
abacamanza:21:22: 22.Nuko ba se cyangwa bene wabo nibaza kuturegera tuzababwira tuti ‘Mubaduhere ubuntu kuko umuntu wese tutamuboneye umugore muri ya ntambara. Ubwo mutababahaye ntimuriho urubanza.’ ”
abacamanza:21:23: 23.Nuko Ababenyamini babigenza uko bohejwe, binyagira abageni mu babyinnyi nk’uko umubare wabo wari uri barabajyana. Baragenda basubira muri gakondo yabo, bongera kubaka imidugudu bayibamo.
abacamanza:21:24: 24.Nuko Abisirayeli baherako bavayo, umuntu wese ajya mu muryango w’iwabo no mu nzu ye, bose bavayo basubira muri gakondo zabo.
abacamanza:21:25: 25.Ariko icyo gihe Abisirayeli nta mwami bari bafite, kandi umuntu wese yitegekaga uko ashatse.
